metadata.synopsis: Danis is happy or sad, depending on the survival of Bex
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_ATeleport to S_WYR_RefugeeCamp_YoungLover_01 and talk to Danis

0.speaker: Danis
0.text: Bex died. Bex is dead. I'm alive, but for what? I'm no one without Bex.

1.speaker: Danis
1.text: We made it alive to Baldur's Gate! Almost, anyway, but I can't complain. When I look at Bex and realise she's safe, it's hard not to weep from joy.
